content: learn how to crochet a super simple and stylish **granny stitch triangle scarf** with this free crochet pattern with a photo and video tutorial *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** aran 4 medium yarn 6 0 mm j/10 us 4 uk crochet hook tapestry needle **yarn & yardage** i used 3 skeins 642 yds / 588 m of stylecraft special aran 214 yds / 196 m 100 g in color copper 1029 feel free to use any comparable yarn that meets gauge or any yarn with the appropriate crochet hook **size** 67 170 cm wide by 29 5 75 cm deep **gauge** 2 row in pattern in 4 10 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
